hero.name: Onur Dursun
hero.title: Full Stack Developer & Data Scientist
hero.description: I build modern web applications and develop AI-powered solutions. Passionate about creating innovative products with cutting-edge technologies.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: A collection of my recent work showcasing full-stack development, machine learning, and creative problem-solving.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.subtitle: Intelligent solutions using machine learning and data science

web.title: Web Development
web.subtitle: Full-stack applications and interactive web experiences

insuranceML.title: Insurance ML Project
insuranceML.description: Machine learning customer risk analysis project. Developed using various ML algorithms to predict insurance customer risk profiles. Includes data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model optimization.

urbanSound.title: UrbanSound8K Classification
urbanSound.description: CNN-based environmental sound classification model. Deep learning model that classifies city sounds (car horns, dog barking, etc.) with high accuracy using the UrbanSound8K dataset.

transcendence.title: ft_transcendence
transcendence.description: Real-time web platform using Docker, PostgreSQL, and Redis. Developed as a 42 School final project featuring multiplayer Pong game, tournament system, chat functionality, and user profiles.

qrManager.title: QR Code Manager
qrManager.description: A comprehensive QR code management system with dynamic QR generation, analytics tracking, and user authentication. Features include QR code creation, scanning statistics, and role-based access control.

chatApp.title: Real-time Chat Application
chatApp.description: A real-time chat application with global chat rooms, private messaging, and WebSocket integration. Supports multiple users with nickname system and message history.

terminalWebsite.title: Terminal Website
terminalWebsite.description: Interactive terminal-style portfolio website with command-line interface. Features custom commands, file system navigation, and retro terminal aesthetics.

footprintCO2.title: FootprintCO2
footprintCO2.description: Carbon footprint tracking application built with TypeScript. Helps users monitor and reduce their environmental impact through data visualization and analytics.

interactivePDF.title: PDF Book
interactivePDF.description: Interactive PDF book reader with annotation features. Built with TypeScript, allows users to highlight, comment, and bookmark content.

pdfProcessing.title: PDF Data Processing
pdfProcessing.description: PDF data extraction and processing tool. Automates data extraction from PDF documents using TypeScript and Python.

airbnbNYC.title: AirBnb NYC Analysis
airbnbNYC.description: Data analysis of New York City's Airbnb 2019 dataset from Kaggle. Exploratory data analysis, visualization, and insights extraction using Python and Jupyter Notebook.

akbankML.title: Akbank Machine Learning
akbankML.description: Global AI Hub Akbank Machine Learning project using Melbourne Housing Market Dataset. Predictive modeling and data analysis for housing prices.

aygazML.title: Aygaz Machine Learning
aygazML.description: Machine learning project developed for Aygaz. Includes data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation using various ML algorithms.

depthAI.title: Depth - Video FPS Upscaling
depthAI.description: Uses Neural Artificial Intelligence for Video FPS Upscaling. Deep learning model that enhances video frame rates using AI techniques.

globalAI.title: UrbanSounds CNN Project
globalAI.description: Global AI Hub CNN Project team solution. Convolutional Neural Network for urban sound classification and analysis.

pythonDataScience.title: Python For Data Science
pythonDataScience.description: Comprehensive Python data science projects and tutorials. Covers pandas, numpy, matplotlib, and machine learning fundamentals.

cliAnnotation.title: CLI Annotation Tool
cliAnnotation.description: Command-line interface annotation tool for TNLP (Turkish Natural Language Processing). Python-based tool for text annotation and labeling.

solvent.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed end-to-end systems by integrating AI models into ASP.NET and Angular-based applications.
Developed AI-based solutions integrated into production environments.
Took an active role in deployment, testing, and operational monitoring processes in live environments.
Improved efficiency in data labeling processes with Python-based automations.

havelsan.title: Data Analyst Intern
details: Performed big data processing tasks using Elasticsearch, Hadoop, and Apache Spark.
Analyzed the performance and accuracy of software components.

koc.title: NLP Research Intern
details: Conducted data preparation, model evaluation, and analysis work for NLP projects.
